hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Umayr ibn Umayyah: that he had a sister who used to harm him regarding the Prophet ﷺ, and she cursed the Prophet ﷺ, and she was a disbeliever. So he took a sword for her one day, then came to her and placed it upon her, killing her. Her sons rose up and shouted, and said: We know who killed her. Will you kill our mother while there are people here who have disbelieving mothers and fathers? When Umayr feared that they would kill someone other than the killer, he went to the Prophet ﷺ and informed him. He said: Did you kill your sister? He said: Yes. He said: And why? He said: Because she was harming me regarding you. The Prophet ﷺ sent to her sons and asked them, and they named someone other than the killer. The Prophet ﷺ informed them of him and waived her blood, so they said: We hear and obey.
